goal.ch:
一、理解基礎文法與句型概念。
二、培養基礎閱讀、聽解、會話、書寫能力。
三、培養對日本社會與文化之理解。
四、培育自主學習的能力。

★本學期遵學校規定到校上課。
（倘若學校公告因防疫需求而需改為線上課程時，相關網址訊息如下：
視訊通話連結：https://meet.google.com/oui-kkum-dne。
請注意，若學校未公告需實施線上課程，上述網址不會開放。）
goal.en:
1.Understand basic Japanese grammar concepts and Japanese sentence structure.
2.Cultivate the basic ability of reading / listening / speaking, and writing skills.
3.Cultivate the understanding of Japanese society and culture. 
4.Cultivate the ability to learn independently.

outline.ch:
★導言、發音規則
★第一課～第三課：名詞句說明、代名詞、時間數字等詞彙規律
★第三～第七課：動詞句說明、基礎動詞變化規律、格助詞說明
outline.en:
★The introduction and the pronunciation rules of Japanese
★Lesson1~3:The explanation of noun sentences
★Lesson3~7:The explanation of verb sentences

textbook.ch: 大家的日本語（改訂版）  初級一

flexDiscription.ch: 依教學進度給予日語作文及演說，以現場或影片方式呈現。
flexDiscription.en: According to the teaching progress, students will be given Japanese composition and speech exercises, which will be presented on the spot or in the form of video.
